has research problem: model the compositionality in text sequences

has research problem.from sentence: Many deep learning architectures have been proposed to model the compositionality in text sequences, requiring a substantial number of parameters and expensive computations.

has research problem: model the compositionality in variable-length text sequences

has research problem.from sentence: Leveraging the word-embedding construct, many deep architectures have been proposed to model the compositionality in variable-length text sequences.
